review_text: Flexible check in really helped us out.
We stayed with our two dogs and it was perfect. The internet is very slow so we couldn’t get much work done, but other than that perfect place for us and our pups!
Very cozy cottage a perfect get away for a weekend.

The good: Large place, very friendly host, fenced yard for dogs, kitchen, ample parking, grass and trees.
Hot water odor of sulfur (eggs) presumably from well - I couldn't take a shower for more than 3 minutes before getting out gagging. My wife wouldn't use the bath. House smelled of eggs after that. Dogs are very friendly but barked quite a bit knowing we had dogs, and they have access to the same yard via a dog door into their main house. Be careful if your dogs aren't friendly. Almost left but it was too late.
Well-worn 1980's style, decor, bed pillows, TV, and CD player. Beds not good. Needs $40K update and it'd be a gold mine. The mermaid painting - we had to find it from the previous reviews. It's a very good pencil line-art drawing of a well-endowed 25-year old woman arching her back - who happens to have a mermaid tail. I looked at it much longer than my wife did, so I get what the other lady was saying.
Loved the dog yard. Spacious and well equipped kitchen.

Tim’s guest house was such a cozy little gem! The whole property was just beautiful, and our dogs had a blast running around safely thanks to the fenced yard. Whenever we ran into anyone there, they were nice but also minded their business. The guest home was very clean overall, it was just a really relaxing, comfortable stay in a gorgeous setting.

Stay at Tim's was great. Tim greeted us on arrival and welcomed us & our dog.
Cottage was clean and comfortable. There was a TV, but even better a CD player for us to listen to music while I cooked and while we ate. Bed was comfortable and coffee was there for the morning.
The sheets were soft and smelled like fresh laundry. The shower was nice and clean. We had a nice weekend stay here.
Our third stay - need we say more?
The place was quiet even though on a road. The dogs were friendly and cute. The house did have a slight odor and we found roach droppings but no roaches were actually seen. Overall an ok stay.

Tim was a great host; he gave clear instructions, was welcoming, and turned on all the lights in the guest house for my arrival. This helped immensely because I arrived very late in the evening after a road trip. Would recommend, especially for a weary traveler.
I’m a repeat customer, and will be back again. Thanks Tim!
This place is newer and cleaner than what the pics show
This was an excellent place to stay in Jesup Ga. Very nice grounds and exceptionally clean home. We will be staying here every year on our way to Florida!
Wonderful quiet restful place. Enjoyed watching the deer out the back door. Would stay again. Great location.

Tim’s place was a great stop on my way further south. The house was as described and the instructions were perfect! Added bonus was a fenced in back yard and his 2 beautiful dogs. Wonderful water pressure in the shower, everything I needed.
Thanks for a great stay!

Booked the pool house for my brother to coincide with our staying at Tim's guest house. He LOVED the poolhouse. Setup much like a studio apartment it had everything he needed for a relaxing stay. He's already talking about booking again next spring.
Great place to stay with friendly host. The pool is definitely worth it.
we were in town working, and our stay here was next to perfect.
It was a quick overnight on the way to the beach. Everything was as described and easy to find. Plenty of room and accessories, toiletries provided for a great stay.

Gorgeous property. The pool is huge. House is very nice & the beds were very comfortable. Loved the covered parking too.
Met Tim & he’s very personable & seems like a great guy.
Nice place very quite and easy to get to and from

Really love this place!!’
Lots of space
As always, I enjoyed myself & really enjoyed the guest house! I think I may like it more than the pool house! :) thank you, Tim!!
We appreciated the secure covered parking. Friendly dogs. Peaceful setting with nice yard to sit outside with morning coffee.

Location was convenient to activities we were in town to attend. It was nice to have a yard for our elderly dog to roam a little. Tim made check in process very easy and we had everything we needed so there was no need to contact him for anything. H

My mom and I stayed at Tim’s guest house to attend a family funeral. He was quick to respond to book; provided clear check in instructions and the location was easily accessible for my mother who is an amputee. We enjoyed our stay!

This was our second stay. We expect to stay a couple of times a year as we travel between NC and Florida. Great setting for our dog to be able to run in the fenced area. Pet friendly is always a priority for us.

This was our second stay at the Guest House. I'm not sure what more could be added to my review of our stay in Oct, '22. Tim is a wonderful host, very affable and always available to help. We are so comfortable at the Guest House, it's becoming our second home.
What a wonderful, dog friendly compound.
Great place to stay and very homey feeling

Tim was a great host and has a great house. Communication was excellent, directions were on point, clean kid & pet-friendly house, and the pool was perfect for back to back days in the 90s. Tim was a very interesting dude with a lot of cool stories, I highly recommend chatting him up if you have the chance. I was also fortunate enough to witness a once in a lifetime moment with his Colt :)
Overall, it was a fantastic stay, and I'm looking forward to returning.
As always, quiet clean and comfortable.
Tim was very welcoming and his place was comfortable. He was quick to respond and very flexible with our arrival. Would definitely stay again.

If you are looking for a short stay or long term THIS is the place. It isn’t a small hotel like room but a small home with all you need. I would recommend this place for a long term visit if I was staying anywhere near-by. We only stayed one night because of our schedule, but with the price, location and room, this is our go to place in Georgia.

Since we were traveling w/ our dog, Nickel, Tim's guest house was an awesome find! Not sure who enjoyed our stay more, her or Mike & I. What an understated luxury to have the fenced in yard, she could explore and roam on her own and we didn't have to worry.
Tim's place has everything needed for a comfortable stay. The central location made for easy day trips to Savannah, Brunswick & St Simons.
Of course, no review of Tim's place would be complete w/o mentioning "The Girls" as we referred to them. Sherlock & Rosie are two of the sweetest dogs ever. They both not only welcomed Nickel, but also tolerated her 3 year old lab energy.
Thanks again, Tim for everything. We'll be back for sure!!
Tim is a great host! The guesthouse was clean, well stocked and private. Plus access to his beautiful pool and the smell of his smoker 💞 I would recommend for sure!
Spacious, comfortable, fully equipped guest house in lovely setting. Great having a fenced in yard for my dog to play in.

Tim’s place is spacious, clean, homely, and super dog friendly! My pup and I had a great time playing with Tim’s pups in the fenced yard. Tim is super friendly and had great local recommendations. Highly recommended!
Fantastic little place to stay. Tim communicates promptly. Very comfortable.
Great location perfect for dog owners. Perfect location for Peaches to beaches.
Pet Friendly Stay.
This is a great property with a beautiful pool and outdoor area. Tim is very responsive and helpful.
Tim is an excellent host!! I'm actually extending my stay for an additional month. I highly recommend him.
Peaceful , thanks for the stay
Tim is a Super host and is always very helpful and is quick to respond back to your messages
Once again, our stay at Tim's place was perfect. We ran into some problems and had to extend our stay and Tim was more than accommodating.
Fantastic host !! very helpful and quick to respond to any questions

The guest house is a delight. Easy to find, comfortable bed, great kitchen, beautiful grounds, quiet. Tim is a generous host, very responsive, and has thought of everything. I will definitely come back there the next time I go through the area.
I really enjoyed staying here it is really secluded and it has an amazing swimming pool and out door area

Great house, Tim is also a great host, this is not a place to just stay one night, you will have a nice time with all the amenities Tim house have, it is a fully equipped house. Tim also has two lovely dogs!!!!!
Tim is a great host . The house is exactly as presented , no surprises . It was very clean and in a quiet area .
Awesome low key house in a woodsy environment. If you want to get away and relax by the pool, this is the spot.
Once again, our stay at Tim's property was wonderful. The location is quiet, but close to necessities. We look forward to staying again in the coming months!

Tim offers a safe and spacious refuge for travelers. We were moving to the area and needed a place to stay for a couple of weeks. We had 3 dogs( one passed prior to our visit at Tims) but Tim was fine with allowing us to bring our dogs.
Check in was easy and Tim was very easy to communicate with. He was prompt with answers to any questions I had.
Beautiful grounds. Nice pool and quiet setting at a very reasonable price.
Tim’s place was fantastic! Lots of space. Huge pool and lot of space for dogs to run and play.
We have stayed with Tim twice. Very accommodating and fast communication. Like both of his places. Great place to stay when fishing or a getaway. Great value. Feel safe here. Thanks Tim.
Bonafide nice

Tim was very responsive and his place was just what we needed on our trip. There was some great if odd to find in an AirBnB kitschy art that we enjoyed. There were however a number of kitschy signs encouraging skinny dipping and topless bathing. Though I believe women should get to go topless whenever it came off as kinda creepy in an AirBnB hosted by a dude.
We definitely recommend this place to others
Incredible Experience in jesup and at Tim’s place !
Wonderful host and home!! The dog is a very kind host too
He has such friendly labs. One even walked in the guest house and gave us a tour lol.
In addition to providing excellent hospitality Tim was extremely accommodating and flexible with my stay and variable schedule.
Great place to stay with a great location!
Great place

Check in was easy and simple and everything in the place was exactly as described. The bathroom was very clean as were all the other living spaces. For the price this is listed at, I can highly recommend it to anyone wanting to stay in the area.
Animal hair on bed/couches and rugs. No internet access.

Tim's place was just great. We arrived after dark and were a bit disoriented trying to find it, but Tim waited for us at the end of his driveway with a flashlight to guide us in from the road. His cottage was large and had a full kitchen, sitting room, two bedrooms, and large bathroom--and it was sparkling clean. We had a great night's sleep and then were on the road early the next day, but Tim's hospitality will not be forgotten!

Tim’s home was perfect for our work trip. Great location. The atmosphere is laidback and inviting. I especially loved the pool area with bar. Oh and the Labs super nice they made it feel like home. Tim and Angle are super nice and we came home with a southern accent! Five STARS!!!!

I’m riding my bicycle across the country, and after a long day on the saddle, staying at Tim’s was a welcome relief! They even offered to drive me into town to get dinner, although I ended up ordering delivery.
Nice and spacious accommodations. Quiet and peaceful. Tim’s place suited our needs exactly.
Tim was very flexible with my check-in and check-out times, and helped me arrange to pick up some things I forgot. The place was great and roomy.
Cute house, great place for a weekend stay
Great place to stay. Very quiet and clean!

I’m cycling the atlantic coast trail, and the countryside area around Jesup is a weak spot on the map because of a lack of services.
I’m happy that Tim was available on such a short notice. He wasn’t at home but he made sure that someone else welcomed me.
The dogs are an added bonus, they’re fun and wanna play all the time!

Tim was great! We left some very important things at the house and called to find them. Tim helped us find them AND waited for us to get back to give them to us personally. He even offered to ship them to us!
Awesome host. Quiet and peaceful area with a few personal touches of nature (wild turkeys and deer). Perfect place for a get away.

We stayed in Tim's guest house. It was a spacious, two bedroom unit with a large bathroom and kitchen. We had everything we needed. The beds were extremely comfortable. Tim was gracious, welcoming and helpful. I'd definitely stay there again.
Tim is a great host. Bed was very comfortable. We were concerned about the number of personal items laying around.
Private space with a nice outdoor area.

Tim is a great host. Can’t do enough for you. The apartment has everything you will need. Deer at dusk in the back garden too! Jesup is just down the road and has some great restaurants. If you’re anywhere near here, this Airbnb is a perfect stopover. Highly recommended.

Tim's place is located in rural southeast Georgia. Traffic isn't bad and he is right off a major highway, and the highways are scenic. I stayed in the guest house and it felt like I was staying with family. Tim was very welcoming and made me feel at home. I had all of the comforts of home (satellite & Wi-Fi) and he even let his dogs into the courtyard between the 3 houses so I could play with them. It is a rural area, so expect wildlife, bugs & insects to be around the property. I would stay there again!
great Host nice country feel . would stay again .
Peaceful stay. Will stay again in the future if I’m in this area. Thanks to Debbie and family for the great stay.

wonderful host
wonderful place
Relaxing and quiet getaway! Beautifully decorated! We really enjoyed our stay here. Debbie and her husband are friendly and helpful hosts.

What a great host and beautiful place
Thank you
Had another wonderful stay at the Bardominium. It’s so cute and very clean!
"The Red House" My granddaughter loved the Red House. The home was clean, the area was quiet and the hostess was readily available. I would definitely stay there again.
Plan on staying here again!!

very friendly and accommodating.
would definitely go back
What a beautiful place. We enjoyed our stay very much.
Definitely wished we stayed for more than one night!!
Fun and cozy place to stay. It was a good location for our weekend events and adventures in and around Jesup and Ludowici. Also enjoyed the porch and cow spotting!
Debbie's place was quiet and isolated but close enough to my mother's place so we could perform our hospice duties. Thank you so much!
Such an inviting space, both inside and out.
Great location! Beautiful to sit on the porch and just relax. Lots of places to eat and quality stuff to do!

Our stay was a brief one night stay with most of it spent sleeping. We departed early the next morning and didn't get to enjoy the property. We will plan any future stays in the Jesup area in the Barn and more time set a side for hanging at the property.
Initial issue with internet but Debbie was very responsive it was quickly resolved. Clean and comfortable. More than enough room for the two of us. Thanks!
Super cute place! Very clean and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again!

It was great! My husband was sent to Jesup for work and spending March there in this rental was great! our boys loved riding their bikes up the long driveway most days and visiting the cows. The Moxley's are wonderful friendly people! The house had everything we needed and most of what we wanted! There were a couple small issues that Debbie worked hard to resolve! Would recommend to anyone and would stay again if the opportunity comes.
Debbie's place was a great fit for my family of 5 adults during our road trip. Would definitely stay again!

They know how to do hosting right. It was a beautiful county home. We loved it! It’s bright, stylish, and the host are super friendly and accommodating. This is the only place to stay in the area. I highly recommend.

This was just what I needed! A clean, inviting, warm, cozy, peaceful, QUIET oasis to step into and call home! Debbie + her husband truly went out of her way to make it feel like a home away from home! I WISH I had booked a longer stay, but this was my first booking with AirBNB and I was so afraid of being disappointed... Alas, that couldn't be further from the truth! I look forward to staying here -- again and again -- every time I pass through town. The decor is just as I would decorate if I had a dream-barn of my own! Love, love, love!!! Highly recommend clicking "reserve" if you're considering. If you need a break from the hustle, stay as long as you can!

Spacious, Clean and Peaceful.
Great value.

Debbie and her husband were very congeniel hosts.
They went out of their way to nake us feel welcomed.
Debbie was quick to answer any questions or concerns we might have had.
Our firt stay in a bardaminium was exceptional.
We were very comfortable and cozy.
On our list of places we would return.
The best experience.

This place has everything! You don’t need to worry about anything it’s so quiet at night and there’s no lights from the city, if you want to relax and feel like in home, this is the right place for you!

Thank you very much for letting me stay at your home, I enjoyed it a lot, I came to Georgia for work reasons but this place made me feel at home, it is very relaxing, I loved that it is retired from the city and there is not much light at night. I would definitely stay in this house again! Thank you very much to Debbie and her family for being so kind.
Great host . Space as pictured . 1 and half hours to Savannah and 1 hour to Jekyll island .

Stephen was a fantastic host- communicative,
accommodating, and generous. The cabin is incredibly nice and the surroundings can’t be beat for a peaceful getaway. The cabin is clearly loved by Stephen and his family and it’s very special they are sharing it with others on ABNB. We would absolutely love to stay again.
It was a great place really enjoyed the quiet countryside will definitely stay when we come back

Peace, tranquility, paradise, relaxation, just a gem. By far, the best place we have ever stayed. Stephen was excellent, he was such a great host, any request that we had was taken care of. Anything that we needed, this wonderful place had it. Truly an amazing place and experience.
Kayla is a very responsive and caring host! We felt right at home for our little weekend getaway. Couple blocks from downtown while also tucked away and private. Perfect little getaway for two!
Cute place and just what we were looking for on our quick weekend.
A great place to stay. I definitely recommend staying here.
He was very responsive on his communication and flexible. I wish we could have stayed a few days longer - the area was beautiful and we look forward to staying in the future.
Awesome host! Enjoyed the privacy and the comfort of the stay. Next time I will make sure to bring my golf clubs.
great place. will stay again
This was a great stay! Super comfy bed, clean, and had all the necessary amenities and more! Beautiful neighborhood as well! Definitely recommended!
our stay was very nice, quite and clean. very safe neighborhood. we will stay again.
It was a great stay

Great, safe location! This place is a guest house near the back of the property near the pool. Parking is located near the first drive near the mailbox and driving straight back. Parking was the only thing that slightly confused us, everything else was very clear and exceeded our expectations. One of the nicest air bnb’s I’ve rented and one of the cleanest as well. Also, well-decorated and I absolutely loved the lit mirror. Was my favorite feature and made getting ready so easy! 😊
Loved the place. Hopefully it will be available on our next trip to Jesup.
Perfect for my needs. I Will definitely stay again. Kylie was extremely responsive.
Kylie was great! She even checked on us one morning and allowed us a late checkout. We would stay here again. The large soaking tub is also a welcomed addition.
Great stay. Nice place and very responsive host.
Beautiful place, will definitely stay again if I’m the area.

Very nice neighborhood, easy to find & super clean!
Quick responses from owner, very private & would definitely book again!
Amazing people second time staying 🙏🏽
Extremely pleased. Quiet secluded and in great condition. Most definitely recommend to others

Cute place with all the amenities we needed for an overnight stay. I could see a long weekend there being very pleasant as well. Kylie was very responsive to my request to remove air fresheners due to my allergies. The bedroom is small for a king-size bed, so it is against the wall and one person has to climb in from the end, but that was not a big deal for us and I am sure it would not be for others. You can tell that is the case from the pictures so it was not a surprise. The living area is spacious and welcoming and the couch is so comfortable. I just wish my schedule had allowed time to enjoy the pool!
Wonderful home and she’s very nice.
I had a great stay ! Thank you for having us.

There is not a better host, or stay in all of Jesup, GA. She hosted me for 3 days a week for 7 weeks and was phenomenal to deal with. The guest suite is beautiful, relaxing and offers every amenity you could possibly need.
We were nervous about staying on someone else’s property but the space was absolutely perfect, warm, & welcoming! Highly recommend Kylies Airbnb to anyone coming to Jesup!
I wouldn’t stay anywhere else when visiting Jesup. This is the Crown Jewel of Jesup over night stays.
It’s was a great stay and very comfortable
As always Kylie’s place is THE place to stay when visiting Jesup.
Exceptional stay! Beautiful, new, comfortable, private, safe neighborhood…Kylie’s guest home exceeded every expectation!! You will love it!!
Love staying in Kylie’s place when I’m visiting Jesup for work! It’s perfect.
What a high class place to stay and well worth the price we paid. Very clean, nice soaking tub, beautiful furniture, quite and we will definitely stay again on our trips down to Florida.
Kylie continues to be an amazing host as I visit Jesup weekly for work. The place is so beautiful and peaceful.
Great place for a layover. hosts very responsive. easy check in.

I’ve done a large amount of contracting work in the Jesup area and Kylie’s guest house is hands down the most comfortable and at home I’ve felt. It features wonderful accommodations, and a great master bedroom with comfortable accommodations.
This was our second time staying at this home. We absolutely love it! It is so quiet and such a peaceful get away! We will return. It is our favorite:)
Kylie's place was great. Quiet and peaceful, just what I wanted, to chill and relax a few days in the sunshine!
Very nice location and beautiful property.
Nice quiet place, perfect for 1 or 2 people.
Very cute and tiny place for couple bonding. We had everything we needed and all supplies like soaps and lotion were available to use. Was very clean and bed was comfy. Loved it!
Great place to stay, just what we needed. Has everything you need. 10/10 would stay again.
Beautiful place. Clean and well equipped.
Second time staying. Still love this spot. Will be back
Clean house. Safe neighborhood. Would stay again
Very clean and nice place! Great neighborhood. Highly recommended

What a great place to stay! In an awesome neighborhood..isolated enough for privacy, but convenient enough to get to restaurants and some shopping. It was perfect for what I needed for business with an easy drive to Ft. Stewart.
The host...Kylie is fantastic and very accommodating. Just the right touches to make a home away from home. The place is spotless and steps away from the pool.
I will absolutely stay here again and I highly recommended it. Well done!

The size and cleanliness of the place makes this a high value stay. Add in the excellent communication, ease of check in and quietness and you will question why ever stay in a traditional hotel ever again. Thank you!
Perfect getaway
This was a perfect place for us. It was quiet and beautiful surroundings. Derrick is an amazing host!
We would definitely stay again.
Fairly priced.

This is a wonderful place to stay if you like peace and quiet like I do.
There’s plenty of room and everything in the house worked.
The next time I’m in town I will be checking on this place again

Derrick was an excellent host. We were very comfortable with our stay here. Wish the mosquitoes were not invited, and the dirt road made it a bit challenging after the rain. Derrick was helpful with the tv and permitting our dog being in the house. The car port was a great help. We appreciated all this place offered.
This was a perfect place for us on our trip south. We wanted to do some exploring in the area for personal reason. The place has all the most important basics for us. Nice and peaceful.
His place is exactly as described.. Worked well for what I needed.

At first, we were worried when the road pavement ended. But once we got to the house, seeing all the neighbors and their friendliness, and knowing Derrick lives just down the road, all our concerns ended. The location gave us great access to the coastal islands and historical sites from Charleston SC to Jekyll Island. The accommodations met all our needs and Derrick responded quickly to all our communications. It will remain on our list of possibilities for next Jan-Feb.
Immaculately clean, looks just like the photos. Was the 3rd GA rental I've been in, and by far the best.

Well equipped and well laid out cabin. Clean and comfortable – perfect for a long stay in Jesup. It also has excellent location. Communication with Derrick was very easy. We enjoyed the stay in his cabin. Highly recommended!

I got to stay this entire summer here. Loved everything, it was quiet backwoods area that offered a pond to fish in and spacious overhang porch. As someone who is very laid back kind of country it truly was a slice of heaven. 15 mins to small town of Jesup and 40 mins to Brunswick 50 mins to the islands. Far enough away for extra peace and close enough for plenty to do. I'll be back absolutely for sure. Also the nicest hosts ever.
Derrick was accessible if needed easy check in, clean, everything needed was available. Would stay again.

Derrick's spot is out in the country and the accommodations are as advertised.
Nothing fancy but adequate and satisfactory.
We enjoyed walking down to the boat ramp -- it looks a bit like "Where the Crawdads Sing", a little magical. But the mosquitoes liked me a lot more than I liked them!
a good host very friendly a very clean place very cozy would definitely stay there again when I come back to Jesup
Nice place to detach and get away.

Couldn't be happier with our experience with Francisco's place. We are doing a project in Jesup, and it was the perfect location for our crew, as well as a nice place to relax and unwind at the end of a busy day. Thank you!
Outstanding place to get away from the world. Just the smell of the water was the only issue
Francisco was amazing. Good little spot. Relaxing

This place was amazing. It is a peaceful cabin set on 40 acres. Although it provides privacy and seclusion, it is only 10 minutes from downtown Jesup. Francisco was an incredible accommodating host and always quick to communicate with any questions we had. Myself and my crew stayed here for almost 2 months while working on a project in Jesup. Franciso had no problem with us parking our trailers in the grass which was very helpful. He even allowed us to bring a camper which they had full hookups for at a small additional cost. If ever in Jesup again, this is where I would stay. I highly recommend!

The cabin was the perfect lil family get away for my family the screened in front porch was our favorite part for anytime at all morning ,noon or night we could be out and enjoy without getting eaten by bugs !!!! The cabin was cute and big enough for just us four and far as surrounding areas for stuff to do we was an hour away from any direction we wanted to go so we was kinda in the middle ! The cabin is quiet and peaceful and it is the perfect spot to turn off the phones and enjoy just family !!! Can’t wait to come back !!!
Great place. Very unique and peaceful. The pond is just a short walk further down the drive, and it was really lovely. We had a nice time and will probably visit again.

Francisco was very responsive to our needs. We had to make changes to our accommodations, and Francisco was very quick and helped us make the changes we needed. If you're looking for somewhere peaceful to relax, I would recommend.
Excellent place to stay, would definitely visit again.
Great host , and peaceful stay
Great little cozy cabin just outside of town enjoyed it , very much needed get away , will be back
The cabin is adorable and the location is serene. We'll definitely stay again when we return!

We booked this to have extra space with a lot of family staying in Jesup for Thanksgiving. The location was great for us as it was just down the road from where the rest of the family was staying. The porches are fantastic! Will stay again if needed.
This place is great. Just far enough away from town and set back enough to feel like you are out in the middle of nowhere. Very clean everything you need to relax. We will be back
The grounds were beautiful & allowed us to take walks down to the pond. The screened in porch was the best & just added to our stay. Very nice retreat from our busy lives.
Very nice place to get away from the city. Enjoyed walking the property.
Place was really cute and cozy. Was exactly what I expected and a nice break from everything busy. Cheers!

I’m absolutely in love with this property! It is located minutes from town yet when you are on the property it feels as if you are on a private oasis. My husband children and myself loved walking around looking at the beautiful trees and the cute goats. It was so nice sitting on the screened in porch watching beautiful sunsets and hearing only the sounds of our kids laughing and nature. Definitely one of those moments you want to live in forever. If you need to get back in that honeymoon phase of your relationship I highly recommend coming here away from the world turning your phone off and just enjoy the company with your person. The home is a beautiful and cozy. The host is very responsive and yet very respectful to give privacy. We will be back

Can’t say anything wrong about this place. The house was very nice & cozy. The screened porch definitely made some some cool nights not getting eating alive by bugs. I truly enjoyed myself & will definitely will look you up again for my next trip out.

Wonderful small cabin, the loft was a pretty cool place to sleep and the property was expansive. We really enjoyed our stay. We would advise bringing drinking water as the well water does have the sulfur smell common in this part of the country. It isn't super strong and we cooked, cleaned, and brushed our teeth with the tap water but for drinking, we preferred bottled water. Easy enough!
Very friendly host, quick response time. The cabin is very cozy and the property is beautiful.

The place was very clean just as described. Creston was very friendly. He greeted me as I arrived to make sure everything was good. Checked up periodically to see if I needed anything. The AC went out and he took care of the problem right away to ensure my stay was completely comfortable. I would give more than a 5 star review if I could.
The only thing I regret was that I couldn’t enjoy the pool due to my work schedule.
I would highly recommend staying here.
Beautiful, cozy cottage just minutes from Jesup. Creston was very friendly.
Peaceful is an understatement!!! We had the best sleep we have had in a while!! Everything was super clean and welcoming!!!

I could not have asked for a better first experience with an Airbnb.
Everything was exactly as described and even more. It felt as if I had just walked into my own home.
R. Creston was a very gracious host and I would recommend his accommodations for anyone.
I would definitely return if the beed ever arised.
Thank you Creston
Creston is a great host. Really enjoyed our stay. The home had everything we needed. Really enjoyed sitting on the porch with a great view of the pool and nature. Highly recommended.

This place was amazing. It had everything you could need to feel at home. The bed was super comfortable, the shower was great and the whole place was clean and inviting. It was a quiet neighborhood and the perfect place to stay for a calm weekend to myself.
Absolutely great place to stay. Would definitely stay there again .

We truly enjoyed our stay! Quiet cottage, nestled by the river. The pool was amazing for the kids. Creston was awesome, he communicated great and answered all my questions in a timely manner. We will definitely be returning!

a very nicely located accommodation, amenities and furnishings very tasteful and high quality! everything very clean and tidy!
the kids are in the pool immediately upon arrival, although it was still very fresh

Truly, the pictures don't capture the true beauty of this place. Nestled in a serene and tranquil location, it's absolutely stunning. The hosts were exceptional, always responding promptly within minutes. Their kindness and helpfulness were remarkable. The cottage itself is not only well-equipped but also exquisitely beautiful. Mary and Marvin are just the loveliest people you can find. The place is rustic but awesome if you look for an unplugged hideaway!

Mary's cabin was absolutely charming! We arrived at dark but were still able to get in and settled with no problem. We only got to stay one night.
